channel.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Runescape 718 Server |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/505xfqK_zpsf0054d7f.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=32pt][b]A little introduction[/b][/size][/center] [hr]
[center][b]I have made numerous projects in the past and most have either failed because of my inability to continue a project because of my life in the past. Just stating this now because i know a fair few people on here. My last private server was around a year and a half ago (which also failed because of personal problems) and since then my life has changed drastically. I now have a full time job and a stable life. But what i dont have is 24/7 to code and build websites etc. So i would like to offer a chance to start a project and continue gradually over a time where we can put real detail and features into the server. I will be able to fund this server and pay for advertisements etc. (Can provide proof of this). I will also be able to code in my spare time if needed.[/b]
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,673249.0.html]Link to the FULL Project here[/url] [/center]
[hr]
[center][size=20pt][b]Positions that need to be filled[/b][/size][/center]
[center]Web Developer [b][0/1][/b] Community Manager [b][1/1][/b] - [Nolan2131] Developers [b][0/1][/b] Administrators [b][0/2][/b] Moderators [b][0/2][/b][/center]
[center]
[hr]
[center][size=20pt][b]Applications[/b][/size][/center]
[spoiler=Developer Applicaiton][b]Developer Application[/b] Age - Location (GMT included) - Experience - About yourself - Proof of work (if applicable) -[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Web Developer Applicaiton][b]Web Developer Application[/b] Age - Location (GMT included) - Experience - Built websites before? - About yourself - Proof of work (if applicable) -[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Community Manager][b]Community Manager Application[/b] Age - Location (GMT included) - Experience - Are you good with people? - Managed forums before? - Do you know bbpress/IPB? - About yourself - Proof of work (if applicable) -[/spoiler]
[center][b]Administrator and Moderator Roles will be decided on skype on a 1-1 conversation where i ask you a variety of questions[/b][/center]
[hr]
[center][size=20pt][b]Skype Details[/b][/size][/center]
[center]My skype is Dillonmunien@outlook.com If you would like to pm me directly add me and talk to me on there[/center]
[hr]

item.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Runescape 718 Server |
item.dc:creator: @sammy1019 sammy1019
item.description:
@sammy1019 wrote:

Currently in the closed beta, the 317 is looking sick. So much unique content I’ve never seen anywhere else. The 718 is also starting to get there. This is going to big.

Read full topic
item.source: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Runescape 718 Server |

item.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Runescape 718 Server |
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Bump for this. I’ve worked on a couple of projects with Munien back in the day. He is an extremely dedicated and capable developer with a strive for expanding his own knowledge, if he can’t do something, he’s sure going to figure out how. Excited to be back on a team with him.

Read full topic
item.source: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Runescape 718 Server |

@Munien wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=32pt]A little introduction[/size][/center]
[hr]

[center]I have made numerous projects in the past and most have either failed because of my inability to continue a project because of my life in the past. Just stating this now because i know a fair few people on here. My last private server was around a year and a half ago (which also failed because of personal problems) and since then my life has changed drastically. I now have a full time job and a stable life. But what i dont have is 24/7 to code and build websites etc. So i would like to offer a chance to start a project and continue gradually over a time where we can put real detail and features into the server. I will be able to fund this server and pay for advertisements etc. (Can provide proof of this). I will also be able to code in my spare time if needed.

Link to the FULL Project here
